q: of last resort has long been the claim of "misquote" . You see it all the time when public figures find themselves hoisted and hung out to dry by their own words- out comes the cliche: My words were taken out of context . NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said.
